table.name: vtiger_salesorderservicesrel
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_salesorderservicesrel` ( `salesorderservicesrelid` int(11) NOT NULL, `salesorderservicename` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `salesorderserviceamount` decimal(25,0) default NOT NULL, `salesorderservicecounts` int(2) default NULL, `salesorderproductid` int(11) NOT NULL, `proposerid` int(11) NOT NULL, `proposertime` varchar(100) default NULL, `disposerid` int(11) NOT NULL, `disposertime` varchar(100) default NULL, `disposerresult` text, `salesorderservicecontent` text, `salesorderservicesrelstatus` varchar(100) default NULL, `schedule` varchar(100) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`salesorderservicesrelid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
